name: Hand Knit Infant Pod Bowl Egg Photography Prop
description:
I hand knit each of these beautiful pod bowl egg photography props. They are made from the softest chunky wool blend yarn to comfort sleeping newborns.

I use circular knitting needles to carefully knit each bowl so there are no irritating seams for baby.

My photographers have raved about this prop!

Yarn is machine washable, however I always recommend hand washing my hand made props and allowing to air dry.

Colors currently available are:
fisherman (as shown in photo)
lemongrass
raspberry
taupe
linen
blossom
snapdragon

name: Hand Knit Infant Cocoon Sack Photography Prop
description:
This gorgeous cocoon sack was hand knit by little ole' me using circular needles and all natural soy yarn. The colors of this photography prop photograph so beautifully!

Cocoon sack will accomodate a newborn baby up to 10 pounds. They measure approximately 19"-20" in length.

You won't believe the great photos you will get. Just slip the bay inside and you are ready to shoot!

As with all of my hand made items, please hand wash in cool water and allow to air dry.

Currently only available in pinks.

name: Fringe Blanket Photography Prop Knitting Pattern
description:
This is an easy knitting pattern for a fringe blanket baby photography prop. 

Super cute and super easy pattern that any one can follow. You will need very large knitting needles (size 35) and some fun and funky yarn.

Fringe props are very popular with photographers and they provide for the sweetest newborn photos on Earth!

Upon receipt of payment, your PDF format pattern will be send directly to your email inbox. This is usually done within 24 hours but often MUCH sooner than that!

Happy knitting!

name: Knitting Pattern for Infant Pod Bowl Egg Photography Prop
description:
This is a super knitting pattern for an infant pod bowl egg photography prop. This pod bowl is knit using circular needles and chunky yarn. The results are stunning and so easy!

This pod bowl egg will accomodate a newborn baby up to 10 pounds or so.

Within 24 hours (and usually MUCH sooner) upon receipt of payment, your PDF format knitting pattern will be emailed directly to your inbox. No shipping fees!

Please do not sell this pattern!

Happy knitting!

name: Crocheting Pattern for Chunky Infant Diaper Cover Wrap Photography Prop
description:
This is a super easy crocheting pattern for a sweet and chunky diaper cover to be used as a photography prop. This infant diaper cover wraps around the front and secures with a button for the best fit ever!

You will need a very large crochet hook and some super chunky yarn to make this sweet infant prop. Diaper covers are all the rage now and do a great job of covering up those unsightly Pampers!

Your PDF format crochet pattern will be sent directly to your email inbox within 24 hours (and usually MUCH sooner) upon receipt of payment.

Happy crocheting!
